publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1495.1 Tricia Marwick: Local Governance (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S2M-1495) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, insert at end "but, in so doing, considers that the Scottish Executive should bring forward legislation, as a matter of urgency, to decouple elections to Scottish local authorities from the elections to the Parliament."
